Text:
Here, chitaki, let me show you how to properly do this:

Many thanks, mirrormaster! Quality upload as always - you've been keeping this Marvel fanboy satisfied for some time now. As long as you keep 'em comin', you'll have a loyal slave in me for a long time. :D

If you have the time, would you mind uploading [________]? I'd appreciate it!

See, chitaki? Thank the uploader for their hard work, then make the request. :P
